catalog_script_client.name: Engine Model - onChange

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_46bb16061bacc5905b1b411acd4bcb35
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OLD Technical Services">3a6c66681b0c01905b1b411acd4bcb88</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:110df10d1bc0c1905b1b411acd4bcbb2</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Engine Model - onChange</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	var curVal = g_form.getValue('engine_serial_number');
	if (newValue == '') {
		if (curVal)
			g_form.clearValue('engine_serial_number');
		return;
	}

	var cur_soldproduct = g_form.getValue('engine_model');
	var cur_account = g_form.getValue('account');
	var ga = new GlideAjax('sn_contributor.ContributorUserPortalAJAX');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getInstallBaseFieldsForAccount');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_account', cur_account);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_soldproduct', cur_soldproduct);
	ga.getXML(function(serverResponse) {
		var fields = serverResponse.responseXML.getElementsByTagName('fields');
		setFieldValues('engine_serial_number', fields, curVal, 'install_arr');
	});
   
}
function setFieldValues(field, result, current, array) {
	if (result.length === 0 && current) 
		g_form.clearValue(field);
	for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
		var arr = result[i].getAttribute(array);
		if (arr.length > 0 && arr.split(',').length == 1) {
			g_form.setValue(field, arr);
		} else if (current && arr.indexOf(current) < 0) {
			g_form.clearValue(field);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-22 08:43:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>46bb16061bacc5905b1b411acd4bcb35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Engine Model - onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_46bb16061bacc5905b1b411acd4bcb35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-04 10:03:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
